name: The Calling of Saints Peter and Andrew; Initial D: Saint Andrew; Initial Q: Saint Peter
description: The Calling of Saints Peter and Andrew; Initial D: Saint Andrew; Initial Q: Saint Peter; Master of the Brussels Initials (Italian, active about 1389 - 1410); Bologna, Emilia-Romagna, Italy; between 1389 and 1404; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 33 x 24 cm (13 x 9 7/16 in.); Ms. 34, fol. 172a; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Calling of Saints Peter and Andrew; Initial D: Saint Andrew; Initial Q: Saint Peter
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment
